physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Fine tremor and some difficulty retrieving words noted during lithium treatment.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms included severe depressive episodes interspersed with mild hypomanic episodes, leading to the addition of antidepressants and mood stabilizers.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: During hypomanic episodes, decreased sleep to 5 hours per night and increased energy were observed.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: These episodes were typically followed by severe depressive episodes lasting about 2 weeks.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Complaints of substantial weight gain and difficulty getting to work on time due to inability to fall asleep until 1:00 or 2:00 a.m.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient's sleep-wake cycle became more irregular, contributing to increased mood cycling.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Experiencing depressive episodes severe enough to hamper work performance.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Regularizing her sleep-wake schedule diminished her mood cycling.
